attributes.action: Put an end to the practice of solicitors and their colleagues ripping off the Legal Aid sytem in this country
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Whilst the Banking and Financial quarter have been instrumental in causing the current financial crisis in the world we seem to forget the bleeding of our public resources by the legal advocates. If the money allocated to Legal Aid was greatly reduced then this fund could go some way to help protect pensions and savings
